name: Game-ception
description:
Game-ception

In this game, you progressively go deeper and deeper into the game, and reach new levels, that you have to finish in order to ascend again. But watchout : if you reach the deepest level, you will die.

download https://www.mediafire.com/file/ogsx7h81o9el8xg/ld48build.zip/file

This is the first game i make from A to Z in solo, and that was pretty tough getting it done in 3 days. The terrains tiles graphics ( the only thing i didn't make) are from the https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/34878 asset. 

I plan to fully finish and add a lot of features to this game in the future, mainly to make a better use of the jumps between levels in the game disign.
